EnsemblGenomes 0.99.0

EnsemblGenomes

Source: R/doc.R, R/ensembl.R
EnsemblGenomes.Rd

EnsemblGenomes provides access to genome references and annotations from Ensembl

Usage

list_ensembl_taxa()

list_ensembl_releases(taxon)

list_ensembl_species(
  taxon,
  release = utils::head(list_ensembl_releases(taxon)$release, 1)
)

list_ensembl_files(species, taxon = NULL, release = NULL)

Arguments

taxon

any of list_ensembl_taxa()$taxon

release

any of list_ensembl_releases(taxon)$release

species

any of list_ensembl_species(taxon, release)

Value

A tibble listing available taxa, Ensembl releases and supported species.

Details

List of Ensembl species

As of Jul. 2025, there are around:

  • vertebrate: ~ 325 species [release-112]

  • metazoa: ~ 335 species [release-59]

  • protists: ~ 237 species [release-59]

  • fungi: ~ 1502 species [release-59]

  • plants: ~ 153 species [release-59]

  • bacteria: ~ 31332 species [release-59]

Examples

list_ensembl_taxa()
#> # A tibble: 6 × 2
#>   taxon      url                                               
#>   <chr>      <chr>                                             
#> 1 vertebrate https://ftp.ensembl.org/pub/                      
#> 2 metazoa    https://ftp.ebi.ac.uk/ensemblgenomes/pub/metazoa/ 
#> 3 protists   https://ftp.ebi.ac.uk/ensemblgenomes/pub/protists/
#> 4 fungi      https://ftp.ebi.ac.uk/ensemblgenomes/pub/fungi/   
#> 5 plants     https://ftp.ebi.ac.uk/ensemblgenomes/pub/plants/  
#> 6 bacteria   https://ftp.ebi.ac.uk/ensemblgenomes/pub/bacteria/
list_ensembl_releases('vertebrate')
#> # A tibble: 32 × 3
#>    release     date             url                                    
#>    <chr>       <chr>            <chr>                                  
#>  1 release-112 2024-06-20 11:33 https://ftp.ensembl.org/pub/release-112
#>  2 release-111 2024-06-11 16:17 https://ftp.ensembl.org/pub/release-111
#>  3 release-110 2024-01-25 09:34 https://ftp.ensembl.org/pub/release-110
#>  4 release-109 2023-03-02 09:36 https://ftp.ensembl.org/pub/release-109
#>  5 release-108 2022-10-10 12:59 https://ftp.ensembl.org/pub/release-108
#>  6 release-107 2022-10-24 14:15 https://ftp.ensembl.org/pub/release-107
#>  7 release-106 2022-08-30 11:58 https://ftp.ensembl.org/pub/release-106
#>  8 release-105 2022-02-11 18:12 https://ftp.ensembl.org/pub/release-105
#>  9 release-104 2021-03-30 13:08 https://ftp.ensembl.org/pub/release-104
#> 10 release-103 2021-02-16 17:52 https://ftp.ensembl.org/pub/release-103
#> # ℹ 22 more rows
list_ensembl_releases('fungi')
#> # A tibble: 43 × 3
#>    release    date             url                                              
#>    <chr>      <chr>            <chr>                                            
#>  1 release-59 2024-05-23 10:28 https://ftp.ebi.ac.uk/ensemblgenomes/pub/fungi/r…
#>  2 release-58 2024-05-13 16:08 https://ftp.ebi.ac.uk/ensemblgenomes/pub/fungi/r…
#>  3 release-57 2023-06-05 14:25 https://ftp.ebi.ac.uk/ensemblgenomes/pub/fungi/r…
#>  4 release-56 2023-01-09 10:52 https://ftp.ebi.ac.uk/ensemblgenomes/pub/fungi/r…
#>  5 release-55 2023-02-15 10:25 https://ftp.ebi.ac.uk/ensemblgenomes/pub/fungi/r…
#>  6 release-54 2022-06-29 09:22 https://ftp.ebi.ac.uk/ensemblgenomes/pub/fungi/r…
#>  7 release-53 2022-03-03 22:01 https://ftp.ebi.ac.uk/ensemblgenomes/pub/fungi/r…
#>  8 release-52 2022-07-05 09:04 https://ftp.ebi.ac.uk/ensemblgenomes/pub/fungi/r…
#>  9 release-51 2021-05-05 17:03 https://ftp.ebi.ac.uk/ensemblgenomes/pub/fungi/r…
#> 10 release-50 2022-07-01 11:26 https://ftp.ebi.ac.uk/ensemblgenomes/pub/fungi/r…
#> # ℹ 33 more rows
list_ensembl_species('vertebrate', release = 'release-110')
#> # A tibble: 317 × 6
#>    species                          url           taxon collection release date 
#>    <chr>                            <glue>        <chr> <lgl>      <chr>   <chr>
#>  1 acanthochromis_polyacanthus      https://ense… vert… NA         releas… 2023…
#>  2 accipiter_nisus                  https://ense… vert… NA         releas… 2023…
#>  3 ailuropoda_melanoleuca           https://ense… vert… NA         releas… 2023…
#>  4 amazona_collaria                 https://ense… vert… NA         releas… 2023…
#>  5 amphilophus_citrinellus          https://ense… vert… NA         releas… 2023…
#>  6 amphiprion_ocellaris             https://ense… vert… NA         releas… 2023…
#>  7 amphiprion_percula               https://ense… vert… NA         releas… 2023…
#>  8 anabas_testudineus               https://ense… vert… NA         releas… 2023…
#>  9 anas_platyrhynchos               https://ense… vert… NA         releas… 2023…
#> 10 anas_platyrhynchos_platyrhynchos https://ense… vert… NA         releas… 2023…
#> # ℹ 307 more rows
list_ensembl_files("amphiprion_percula")
#> ℹ Scanning taxons...
#> ✔ Taxon found: vertebrate [release-112]
#> # A tibble: 4 × 8
#>   date             release     taxon   collection species type  url   url_status
#>   <chr>            <chr>       <chr>   <lgl>      <chr>   <chr> <chr>      <int>
#> 1 2024-02-13 16:45 release-112 verteb… NA         amphip… refe… http…        200
#> 2 2024-02-13 16:46 release-112 verteb… NA         amphip… refe… http…        200
#> 3 2024-02-13 16:46 release-112 verteb… NA         amphip… refe… http…        200
#> 4 2024-03-05 08:40 release-112 verteb… NA         amphip… anno… http…        200
list_ensembl_files("amphiprion_percula", release = 'release-99')

#> 2 2019-11-19 03:47 release-99 vertebr… NA         amphip… refe… http…        200
#> 3 2019-11-19 03:47 release-99 vertebr… NA         amphip… refe… http…        200
#> 4 2019-11-25 09:49 release-99 vertebr… NA         amphip… anno… http…        200
